text: India Fisher (born 1974) is a British actress. Her father is the ex-MP Mark Fisher. She is also the stepsister of musician Crispin Hunt and of actress Francesca Hunt, who appears with her in the play Other Lives. She has appeared in the television series Dead Ringers and provided the voice for the character of Sophia Winchell in the BBC.co.uk flash-animated webcast series Ghosts of Albion. She narrates BBC One's cookery programme MasterChefâ€”and also performs voiceovers for television advertisements. She has also appeared in several episodes of the BBC Radio 4 comedy series Elephants to Catch Eels.
Karen Ascoe is an English actress, who has appeared in French Fields, EastEnders, Doctors, The Bill and Casualty, amongst others.

Mark Reinier Tajon Luz (born February 8, 1988 in Quezon City, Philippines) or better known as Mark Luz is a Filipino actor, Model and television personality, He is best known for one of the contestant in Pinoy Big Brother: Unlimited among with Kim De Guzman Mark's love interest in the Big Brother House on daily entry.
